name: Cloudstore
description: The Fileshare App v2 (Now named Cloudstore) is an enhanced version of the original cloud storage platform I developed. This iteration features a significantly improved user interface and expanded functionality.

name: Portfolio App
description: My portfolio showcases my coding projects and the technologies I have utilised. It also highlights some of my skills and experience.

name: Fileshare App
description: This web application allows users to upload files and generate temporary download links for easy sharing utilising Azure for storage.
